Line3.6D03F: The angel Inarius. I’m sure you’ve heard the Cathedral of Light babbling about their holy Father.
Line5.6D03F: Well, he’s real. An angel walks among us.
Line7.6D03F: And when he learns that Lilith is here, blood will flow. They are ancient enemies.
Line9.6D03F: They’ll drag the whole damn world into their feud... unless we can stop it.
VoiceDir3.6D03F: He doesn't have a high opinion of Inarius
